components.name: CRM
components.description: Loading and processing of HubSpot CRM objects like contacts, companies, deals, and tasks

components.name: Marketing Tools
components.description: Loading and data processing of Marketing tools like Ads, Email, Social, Forms and Lists.

components.name: Website
components.description: Rendering of CMS and form submission processing

components.name: Chat & Automation
components.description: Loading and processing of data in Chatflows, Inbox, Feedback Surveys and Workflows

components.name: Reports
components.description: Loading of reports, dashboards, and analytics event processing.

components.name: HubSpot APIs
components.description: The HubSpot APIs include connections to Contacts, Analytics, Workflows, Reports, Forms, and more.

components.name: Integrations
components.description: Third-party tools integrated into your HubSpot account.

components.name: Mobile
components.description: HubSpot's mobile application on iOS and Android

components.name: Developer Tools
components.description: HubSpot developer tools include our CLI, build and deploy, test accounts, Projects, logging and runtime tooling, and more.

incidents.name: Email events and workflow enrolment delayed

incident_updates.body: We're continuing to address the cause of the event processing delays of up to 3 hours since 1:30 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 29, 2026. These delays may impact tools such as email events, workflow enrollment and CRM updates in HubSpot. Our team is actively working to mitigate this issue and will update this page when more information is available. Only customers hosted in North America are currently impacted. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

We're continuing to address the cause of the event processing delays of up to 3 hours since 1:30 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 29, 2026. These delays may impact tools such as email events, workflow enrollment and CRM updates in HubSpot. Our team is actively working to mitigate this issue and will update this page when more information is available.  Only customers hosted in North America are currently impacted. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

We're addressing the cause of the event processing delays of up to 3 hours since 1:30 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 29, 2026. These delays may impact tools such as email events, workflow enrollment and CRM updates in HubSpot. Our team is actively working to mitigate this issue and will update this page when more information is available. Only customers hosted in North America are currently impacted. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

We've identified the cause of the event processing delays of up to 3 hours since 1:30 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 29, 2026. These delays may impact tools such as email events, workflow enrolment and CRM updates in HubSpot. Our team is actively investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.  Only customers hosted in North America are currently impacted. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

We've identified the cause of the event processing delays of up to 3 hours since 1:30 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Jan 29, 2026. These delays may impact tools such as email events, workflow enrolment and CRM updates in HubSpot. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available. Only customers hosted in North America are currently impacted. We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

We estimate that we will restore service in the next hour.

We are mitigating impact from a database impairment which we believe is caused by resource exhaustion. We are scaling the system.

We will be back with an update within 30 minutes.

The information on this page reflects our understanding of the incident and impact at the time of the update.
